name: Dream Jump - Where is the Dog?
name_original: Dream Jump - Where is the Dog?
description:
This is my Game for the Brackeys 2022.1 : Dream Jump

In this game you play as someone who was in a car accident and try to find his dog by going into dreams of other people.

In these dreams you play various kinds of mini games.

Controls:

General:

TAB - Display Next Dialogue

F - Interacting with NPCS

Plattformer Mini Games:

AD - moving left and right

Space - Jumping

Top - Down Mini Games

WASD - Moving Around

Undertale Game

For those whou havent played Undertale:

WASD - Moving Soul

Space - Attacking in Attack Menu

Click on Orange Buttons for Actions

You win by sparing the enemy after they have a 100% progress in Sparing, to see the progress, go into the mercy menu.

Or you can kill him by attacking. 

Credits * WARNING - MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS*

Used Assets:

Kenney or www.kenney.nl (Some of the City art)

Toby Fox (Battle Encounter Sound from Undertale) (Sound is kinda buggy, so doesnt always play)

This Game is also inspired by Toby Fox.
